action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image appears to be an abstract collection of pixelated shapes in various colors. There are four distinct shapes, each in a different color: purple, green, pink, and orange. Each shape has a jagged, Tetris-like appearance, and they are arranged in a non-overlapping layout with some space between each shape. The background is white.
continue

Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image contains a collection of Tetris-like blocks in various colors such as red, purple, yellow, and orange, arranged in a scattered pattern on a white background. The shapes resemble the Tetrominoes used in the game of Tetris, with each consisting of four squares, but they are not connected in a way that would form a solid line as in the game.
